DOC.brief_title: Standard Operating Procedures Anti-HPV ( Human Papillomavirus ) Antibody Detection First-void Urine ( AB-SOP Study )
DOC.detailed_description: In total 57 woman include trial : 38 vaccinate prophylactic HPV vaccine 19 vaccinate prophylactic HPV vaccine . These woman ask collect first-void urine sample Colli-PeeTM device ( Novosanis ) . Hereafter , blood sample 5-10 cc collect . The collected urine blood sample use development optimisation robust analytical protocol sample preparation antibody assay .
DOC.criteria: Female 1826 year Cases ( n=38 ) : healthy woman , fully vaccinate , i.e . receive three dos bivalent ( Cervarix® ) quadrivalent ( Gardasil® ) HPV vaccine ( accord KCE ( Belgian Knowledge Centre Health ) recommendation : age first vaccination 1025 year bivalent 926 year quadrivalent vaccine ) . Cases able prove vaccination ( brand schedule ) official document . Control group ( n=19 ) : healthy woman , selfreported previously vaccinate single dose prophylactic HPV vaccine available ( Gardasil® , Cervarix® , Gardasil9® ) Signing informed consent form ( ICF ) . Giving consent research team ( CEV ) contact his/her general practioner and/or gynaecologist access detail participant HPV vaccination ( schedule ) result cervical smears/cytology , HPV test , colposcopy , biopsy ( included ICF ) .
